definition: A white liquid produced by mammals, typically used as a beverage or as an ingredient in various food and drink preparations. It is commonly consumed by humans and used in cooking, baking, and making dairy products.

examples.english: The milk is in the fridge.
Dairy products contain a lot of calcium.

examples.german: Ich habe eine Laktoseintoleranz und vertrage keine Milch.
examples.english: I have lactose intolerance and can't tolerate milk.
The cat likes to drink milk.
